img.style: border: 4px solid; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: KIDS ONE WORD

h3.span: North Bellmore’s Virtual Spirit Day was last Friday, when everyone in the school district community was invited to dress in his/her school spirit wear or school colors.
Then, they were invited to pick ONE WORD to share with our school community to encourage us, to motivate us, to make us think, and to make us smile.
As demonstrated by our families, faculty, staff and administration, WORDS ARE POWERFUL, click on the link below and enjoy our #ONEWORD Virtual Spirit Day!

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: large; color: mediumpurple;

div.span: ~ Communities and individuals thrive when talents
and abilities of all are valued and fostered

her choices and the impact that they create
There is no limit to human potential
~ Honesty, integrity and trust are essential
All people want to learn and succeed

School employees, taxpayers, and citizens can anonymously contact the NYS Comptroller's fraud hotline to report any suspected fraud or abuse.

Fraud Hotline: 1 (888) 672-4555
Email: investigations@osc.state.ny.us
